DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify candidate markers predictive of response and/or serious toxicity to BMS-734016 (MDX-010).
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study to Determine Predictive Markers of Response to BMS-734016 (MDX-010)
DOC.criteria: Histologic or cytologic diagnosis of unresectable State III or IV malignant melanoma (excluding ocular melanoma); A pre and posttreatment fresh core or excision tumor biopsy must be provided.
